vulnerabilities.title: MJML allows mj-include directory traversal due to an incomplete fix for CVE-2020-12827
vulnerabilities.description: MJML through 4.18.0 allows mj-include directory traversal to test file existence and (in the type="css" case) read files. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2020-12827.

vulnerabilities.title: MJML vulnerable to path traversal
vulnerabilities.description: MJML prior to 4.6.3 contains a path traversal vulnerability when processing the `mj-include` directive within an MJML document.
